metadata.description: An Apache Beam streaming pipeline that reads DynamoDB streams JSON encoded messages from PubSub, serialize them according to schema, de-identify sensitive data and then writes them into a BigQuery table, output pubsub and a backup pubsub.

parameters.name: inputSubscription
parameters.label: Pubsub input subscription.
parameters.helpText: GCP Pubsub subscription to read from, example projects/jhfskdh/subscriptions/test

parameters.name: firestoreProjectId
parameters.label: Firestore Project Id
parameters.helpText: GCP Firestore Project Id, if other than the project where the dataflow runs.

parameters.name: backupTopic
parameters.label: Pubsub backup topic.
parameters.helpText: GCP Pubsub topic for backup of records, example projects/jhfskdh/topics/test

parameters.name: deadLetterTopic
parameters.label: Pubsub deadletter topic.
parameters.helpText: GCP Pubsub topic to write deadletter records to, example projects/jhfskdh/topics/test

parameters.name: numberOfWorkerHarnessThreads
parameters.label: Number of worker harness threads
parameters.helpText: The number of threads per each worker harness process (default: 300)

parameters.name: schemaCheckRatio
parameters.label: Ratio between 0-1 to check for unmapped fields in message.

parameters.name: dataContractsServiceUrl
parameters.label: Data contract service URL
parameters.helpText: Base url for data contract API. API has to have a /contract/topic endpoint.
